backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing four UI modification requirements for CustomCarpetsCtaSection, each tied to specific files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summarized descriptions of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and required static assets for publishing the site to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, favicons, Open Graph tags, and font preloading for Arapey and Jost.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling page sections with a feature flag disabling the Collections section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty file containing no footer implementation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with smooth-scroll navigation, mobile menu, and logo using getPublicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section displaying four capabilities using icon cards with a centered heading and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits grid showing four icon-only cards with a heading and subheading for designer advantages.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a collections grid with randomized or fixed thumbnails and descriptive tags for each carpet type.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details, CTA buttons for WhatsApp and directions, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/CustomC: Shows a custom carpets pitch with capabilities list, hero image, and a WhatsApp project-start CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Implements an image gallery with categories, modal viewer, and error handling for missing images.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the homepage hero section with background image, headline, and CTAs for viewing work or starting a project.
frontend/src/components/sections/UsefulL: Renders a grid of external platform links with auto-selected icons and responsive layout.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports contact details and a helper to generate WhatsApp URLs with prefilled messages.
frontend/src/config/usefulLinks.ts: Defines a list of external useful links including labels, URLs, and optional icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a warm neutral theme with light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds a correctly encoded URL for static assets based on the Vite base path.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project's metadata, requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests for Section 3 updates.
